fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.auth

Interface IPermission

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ITranslated

    public interface IPermission
extends ITranslated
    Defines a permission that may be required to allow a user to access a secured object.

    Permission equality is not uniquely based on the permission name, it will be related to the authorization service managing the permission.

    Thread safety: implementations are required to be immutable and therefore completely thread-safe.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies
    See Also:
    IAuthzService.getPermission(String), IAuthzService.getPermissions(), IAuthzService.getPermissions(IUser, ISecure), IAuthzService.allows(IUser, ISecure, IPermission)
